definition: to recruit/to provoke/to beckon/to incur/to infect/contagious/a move (chess)/a maneuver/device/trick/to confess
to engage (a teacher etc)/to hire/to betroth/betrothal gift/to get married (of woman)

sentences.english: Recruiters told them the salaries were very good, but they were asked for money.
sentences.chinese: 招聘者对他们说工资非常不错，但需要介绍费。

sentences.english: An enthusiastic recruiter can do a lot to sell an organization.
sentences.chinese: 一个热情的招聘者为了推销其公司，会做很多事情。

sentences.english: Hiring is starting to pick up again, recruiters and bankers say.
sentences.chinese: 招聘正在开始再度回暖，招聘者和银行家们说。

sentences.english: Don't forget to ask for contact information from every recruiter you meet.
sentences.chinese: 不要忘记向你见过的每一位招聘者询问联系信息。
